hero.title: Solution EPI SARL
hero.description: We supply personal protective equipment to companies across Cameroon and Central Africa. From construction sites to factories, we help protect workers with quality safety gear.

features.title: Reliable Safety Equipment Supplier
features.subtitle: We understand the local market and provide practical safety solutions for Cameroonian businesses.

certifiedProtection.title: Quality Equipment
certifiedProtection.description: All our equipment meets international safety standards

fastDelivery.title: Local Delivery
fastDelivery.description: We deliver throughout Douala and other major cities in Cameroon

expertConsultation.title: Local Knowledge
expertConsultation.description: We understand workplace safety needs in Cameroon

qualityGuarantee.title: Fair Prices
qualityGuarantee.description: Competitive pricing for quality safety equipment

services.title: Safety Equipment & Services
services.subtitle: We supply protective equipment and provide basic safety guidance to help keep workers safe.

equipmentSupply.title: Equipment Supply

cta.description: We work with construction companies, factories, and businesses across Cameroon. Contact us to discuss your safety equipment needs.

testimonials.title: Trusted by Local Businesses
testimonials.subtitle: See what companies in Cameroon say about working with Solution EPI SARL.

client1.name: Jean-Paul Mbeki
client1.content: Solution EPI SARL provides good quality equipment at fair prices. They understand our local needs and deliver on time.

client2.name: Marie Ngozi
client2.content: Reliable supplier for our construction projects. Good service and they know the Cameroon market well.

client3.name: Antoine Fosso
client3.content: They helped us set up proper safety equipment for our workers. Professional service and good follow-up.

finalCta.title: Ready to Improve Workplace Safety?
finalCta.description: Contact our team in Douala for information about safety equipment and pricing for your business.

products.title: Our Equipment

blog.title: Safety Tips & News
blog.subtitle: Practical advice and updates about workplace safety

AiGenerateButton.errorParsingDescription: The AI response was not valid JSON. Please try again.
AiGenerateButton.noJsonError: No valid JSON object found in the AI response.
AiGenerateButton.dialogDescription: Describe the data you want to generate for this {modelName}. For example, 'a new user named John Doe who is a developer'.
AiGenerateButton.fullPrompt:
You are a data generation assistant for the Solution EPI platform.
Your task is to generate a complete JSON object based on a user's request and a provided model schema.
The JSON object must be valid and should not be wrapped in markdown or any other text.

User Request: "{prompt}"

Model: "{modelName}"

Instructions:
1. Analyze the user request.
2. Look at the model schema below to understand the required fields, their types, and their languages.
3. **Crucially, you must provide plausible values for ALL fields in the schema, especially for all language variations (e.g., fields ending in _en, _fr, _de , etc... it can be less or more languages).** If the user's prompt is in one language, you must translate and adapt the content for the other languages.
4. The output must be ONLY the JSON object.

Model Schema (for your reference):
{schema}

Important: Your final output must be a single, raw JSON object. Do not include any explanatory text, markdown formatting, or anything else before or after the JSON object. The response should start with '{{' and end with '}}'.

AiGenerateModal.title: Generate with AI: {modelName}
AiGenerateModal.description: Describe what you want to generate. The AI will create items based on your prompt.
AiGenerateModal.promptPlaceholder: e.g., 'Create 10 blog posts about digital marketing trends'
AiGenerateModal.validationErrorMessage: Please provide a prompt and a valid count.

validation.promptLength: Prompt must be at least 10 characters long.
validation.maxCount: You can generate a maximum of 50 items at a time.

AiGenerateModal.parsingError: Could not parse the generated content.
AiGenerateModal.formPopulatedSuccess: The form has been populated with the generated content.
AiGenerateModal.saveErrorMessage: An unexpected error occurred while saving.

hero.title: Solution EPI SARL
hero.description: Personal protective equipment supplier based in Douala, Cameroon. We provide safety equipment for workplaces across Central Africa.

about.title: About Solution EPI SARL
about.description1: For over 15 years, Solution EPI SARL has been providing personal protective equipment to companies across Cameroon. We understand the local market and work with businesses of all sizes.
about.description2: We supply certified equipment that meets international standards, adapted to the specific needs of different industries in our region.
about.dedicatedTeam: A team dedicated to workplace safety

productCategories.title: Our Equipment Categories
productCategories.description: Personal protective equipment for different types of workplace hazards.

services.title: Our Services
services.description: Beyond supplying equipment, we provide guidance to help keep your workers safe.

safetyConsulting.title: Safety Consultation
safetyConsulting.description: Site visits and equipment recommendations based on your specific workplace needs.

ppeTraining.title: Equipment Training
ppeTraining.description: Training sessions on proper use of personal protective equipment for your employees.

complianceAudit.title: Compliance Check
complianceAudit.description: Verification that your equipment meets current standards and regulations.

preventiveMaintenance.title: Equipment Maintenance
preventiveMaintenance.description: Regular maintenance services and condition checks for your protective equipment.

standards.title: Standards & Regulations
standards.description: Workplace safety is governed by strict standards. At Solution EPI SARL, all our equipment complies with current international and local standards.
standards.employerMustProvidePPE: Employers must provide appropriate PPE free of charge.
standards.allProductsMeetStandards: All our equipment meets demanding international standards
items: ISO 45001 - Occupational health and safety management systems
EN 388 - Protective gloves against mechanical risks

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.description: Need protective equipment or advice? Our team is available to help.
contact.teamAvailable: Our team is available to answer all your questions
